problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): On the college dorm tour, we visited the rooms of two different students - one who was thin and one who was overweight. The student who was thin had clothes and books strewn all over the floor, whereas the student who was overweight did not.
Question: Whose room was sloppy?
ans0: Not known
ans1: The one who is thin
ans2: The one who is overweight
